docs.snippet: Peggy Sheahan's rural Otero County is steadily losing population. Middle-class jobs vanished years ago as pickling and packing plants closed. She's had to cut back on her business repairing broken windshields to help nurse her husband after a seri...
docs.lead_paragraph: Peggy Sheahan's rural Otero County is steadily losing population. Middle-class jobs vanished years ago as pickling and packing plants closed. She's had to cut back on her business repairing broken windshields to help nurse her husband after a series of farm accidents, culminating in his breaking his neck falling from a bale of hay.

headline.main: DIVIDED AMERICA: Town and Country Offer Differing Realities
headline.print_headline: DIVIDED AMERICA: Town and Country Offer Differing Realities

docs.snippet: From where Peggy Sheahan stands, deep in rural Colorado, the last eight years were abysmal....
